channel.title: Party Politics on Pavia Daily
channel.description: Recent content in Party Politics on Pavia Daily

item.title: Left-Wing Party Turmoil Persists
item.description: After the AMP was founded shortly before the last election under the chairmanship of CedarValiant, it was merged into the LUL, which was founded on Monday, according to a joint press release this evening. It has only been a week since the AMP (Alliance for Mutual Progress) was re-established and it is already over. CedarValiant and LUL (Lyrean Unity League) Chairman SteelHand announced the merger of the two political parties on Friday evening at the first ‘League Conference’ in Westavalonna.
